original_title: 拷問！女子校生マシンバイブ 姫川りな
overview: The popular Machine Vibe series is powered up and released at Sadistic Village! The leading role is Rina Himekawa, who has never had anything to do with hardware! Her beautiful face is distorted with pleasure as she is made to squirt and is made to squirt. The large machine vibrator 'The Earth', which was produced at a total construction cost of 3 million yen, rotates the body of a beautiful girl 360 degrees in the air! Upside down, sideways, face down... I've never seen a vibrator penetrate me and keep making me squid...
title: Torture! Schoolgirl Machine Vibrator Rina Himekawa
